events.message: The customer filed a claim after their vehicle was involved in a collision on the highway last evening.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after confirming the accident involved the customer's car.
An agent was assigned promptly to handle the claim and coordinate assessments and communications.
The customer received an acknowledgment confirming the report of the vehicle accident claim.
Requested the customer to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and a police collision report.
Customer provided all requested documents including detailed photos and the official police accident report.
Investigation began to assess the extent of damage and verify liability for the reported vehicle accident.
Investigation concluded confirming the liability and validating the damages sustained by the customer’s car.
A settlement offer detailing the repair costs and compensation was proposed to the customer.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt service and the amount proposed for settlement.
The claim was formally approved after agreement on the settlement terms by both parties.
The agreed settlement payment was issued to the customer’s bank account without delay.
The claim case was officially closed following successful payment and resolution of all outstanding issues.
Case files and documents for the auto accident claim were archived for future reference and compliance.
